title: Magical eye
data:
The **magical eye**, e, is a [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [SporkHack](/wiki/SporkHack "SporkHack") and [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). In both games, it has several gaze attacks, and resists damage from the main three elements (i.e., [fire](/wiki/Fire "Fire"), [cold](/wiki/Cold "Cold") and [shock](/wiki/Shock "Shock") damage).

## Monster stats by variant

[x][ ]

- SporkHack
- EvilHack

* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [nasty](/wiki/M2_NASTY "M2 NASTY").
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").

| In EvilHack, a magical eye:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [nasty](/wiki/M2_NASTY "M2 NASTY").
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | [EvilHack - monst.c, line 442](https://github.com/k21971/EvilHack/blob/master/src/monst.c#L442)                                                                                                                              |

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), the magical eye is a combination of its counterpart from SporkHack above and the [evil eye](/wiki/Evil_eye "Evil eye") from [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"). It is skittish, meaning it will evade and kite its target where possible. Magical eyes also cannot be tamed or [genocided](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide").

Eating a magical eye [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") will randomly increase or decrease the player's [Luck](/wiki/Luck "Luck") by 2 points.

### Strategy

As with the SporkHack magical eye, a [blindfold](/wiki/Blindfold "Blindfold") or [towel](/wiki/Towel "Towel") is effective to prevent its gaze attacks.

### Encyclopedia entry

A serious nuisance, especially when encountered with other  
monsters. Harasses the player with six different gaze attacks  
at its disposal, and it's skittish, meaning it will evade and  
kite its target, making the magical eye somewhat difficult to  
kill. Eating its corpse will randomly increase or decrease the  
player's luck by two points.

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Magical eye

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The magical eye, e, is a monster that appears in SporkHack and EvilHack. In both games, it has several gaze attacks, and resists damage from the main three elements (i.e., fire, cold and shock damage).

Monster stats by variant

e magical eye (No tile)
Difficulty ?
Attacks Gaze slowing, Gaze 2d6 sleep, Gaze stun, Gaze 4d6 fire, Gaze 4d6 cold, bite 2d4
e magical eye (No tile)
Difficulty ?
Attacks

Gaze slowing, Gaze 2d6 sleep, Gaze stun, Gaze 4d6 fire, Gaze 4d6 cold, bite 2d4

Base level 9

Speed 6
Base AC 4
Base MR 90
Alignment -10 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 10
Nutritional value 10
Size Small
Resistances cold, fire, shock
Resistances conveyed None

In SporkHack, a magical eye:

  • can fly.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a lord to its kind.
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is nasty.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference monst.c#line359
e magical eye (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks Gaze slowing, Gaze 2d6 sleep, Gaze stun, Gaze 4d6 fire, Gaze 2d4 cold, Gaze steal luck
e magical eye (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks

Gaze slowing, Gaze 2d6 sleep, Gaze stun, Gaze 4d6 fire, Gaze 2d4 cold, Gaze steal luck

Base level 8
Base experience 226
Speed 6
Base AC 0
Base MR 90
Alignment -10 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable No
Weight 10
Nutritional value 10
Size Small
Resistances cold, fire, shock
Resistances conveyed None

In EvilHack, a magical eye:

  • can fly.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is nasty.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference EvilHack - monst.c, line 442

In EvilHack, the magical eye is a combination of its counterpart from SporkHack above and the evil eye from UnNetHack. It is skittish, meaning it will evade and kite its target where possible. Magical eyes also cannot be tamed or genocided.

Eating a magical eye corpse will randomly increase or decrease the player's Luck by 2 points.

Strategy

As with the SporkHack magical eye, a blindfold or towel is effective to prevent its gaze attacks.

Encyclopedia entry

A serious nuisance, especially when encountered with other
monsters. Harasses the player with six different gaze attacks
at its disposal, and it's skittish, meaning it will evade and
kite its target, making the magical eye somewhat difficult to
kill. Eating its corpse will randomly increase or decrease the
player's luck by two points.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Magical_eye&oldid=145067"

rawPage:
The '''magical eye''', {{magenta|e}}, is a [[monster]] that appears in [[SporkHack]] and [[EvilHack]]. In both games, it has several gaze attacks, and resists damage from the main three elements (i.e., [[fire]], [[cold]] and [[shock]] damage).

==Monster stats by variant==

 |genocidable=No

 |resistances conveyed=None
 |resistances=cold, fire, shock
 |attributes={{attributes|In EvilHack, a magical eye|fly=1|breathless=1|nolimbs=1|nohead=1|nopoly=1|hostile=1|neuter=1|nasty=1|skittish=1|infravisible=1|infravision=1}}
 |size=Small

 |reference=[https://github.com/k21971/EvilHack/blob/master/src/monst.c#L442 EvilHack - monst.c, line 442]

In [[EvilHack]], the magical eye is a combination of its counterpart from SporkHack above and the [[evil eye]] from [[UnNetHack]]. It is skittish, meaning it will evade and kite its target where possible. Magical eyes also cannot be tamed or [[genocide]]d. 

Eating a magical eye [[corpse]] will randomly increase or decrease the player's [[Luck]] by 2 points.

===Strategy===
As with the SporkHack magical eye, a [[blindfold]] or [[towel]] is effective to prevent its gaze attacks.

===Encyclopedia entry===
{{encyclopedia|
	A serious nuisance, especially when encountered with other
	monsters.  Harasses the player with six different gaze attacks
	at its disposal, and it's skittish, meaning it will evade and
	kite its target, making the magical eye somewhat difficult to
	kill.  Eating its corpse will randomly increase or decrease the
	player's luck by two points.
}}
</simpletabs>
